0.2.name: wordpress/euro-2012-predictor
0.2.description:
This plugin is designed to collect users predictions for each of the matches in the Euro 2012 championship.

Users predict the score for each match in the group and knockout stages and are awarded points based on the accuracy of their prediction.

Match results, user rankings and users' predictions may also be displayed using this plugin.

Beta version - Plugin usable and just requires a little testing. In addition the translations below are not complete as they have been lifted from the World Cup Predictor

Please report bugs etc. in the support forums

Features

  • easy adding of matches, venues, results
  • entry form for users to make predictions on each Euro 2012 game
  • sidebar widget to display prediction standings
  • sidebar widget to display currently logged in users' predictions
  • countdown timer to next prediction deadl
